Welcome to pydrs’s documentation!¶

base.py¶

The core for pydrs, from which all child classes are based

class pydrs.base.BaseDRS¶

Base class, originates all communication child classes

connect()¶

Creates communication bus object and connects

disable_onboard_eeprom()¶

Disables onboard EEPROM

disable_scope()¶

Disables scope

disable_siggen()¶

Disables signal generator

disconnect()¶

Disconnects current communication bus

enable_onboard_eeprom()¶

Enables onboard EEPROM

enable_scope()¶

Enables scope

enable_siggen()¶

Enables signal generator

get_param(param_id, n=0)¶

Get parameter

get_ps_name() → str¶

Gets power supply name

get_scope_vars()¶

Returns scope variables

is_open() → bool¶

Returns whether or not the current communication bus is open (or equivalent terminology)

load_param_bank(type_memory=2)¶

Loads all parameter values into param_data

load_param_eeprom(param_id, n=0, type_memory=2) → bytes¶

Load parameter from EEPROM

lock_udc(password)¶

Locks UDC, disables password protected commands

read_ps_status() → dict¶

Gets power supply status

read_var(var_id: str, size: int)¶

Reads a variable with a given ID

reset_interlocks()¶

Resets interlocks on connected DRS device

reset_udc()¶

Resets UDC firmware

reset_wfmref()¶

Resets WfmRef, next sync pulse takes index back to the waveform’s start.

save_param_bank(type_memory=2)¶

Configures all paremeters according to values loaded into param_data

save_param_eeprom(param_id, n=0, type_memory=2) → bytes¶

Save parameter to EEPROM

select_wfmref(idx)¶

Selects index in current waveform, loads waveform into wfmref_data.

set_param(param_id: int, n: int, value: float) → bytes¶

Set parameter

set_ps_name(ps_name: str)¶

Sets power supply name

set_siggen(freq: int, amplitude, offset)¶

Updates signal generator parameters in continuous operation. Amplitude and offset are updated instantaneously, frequency is updated on the next 1 second update cycle. *This function cannot be applied in trapezoidal mode.

set_slowref(setpoint: float) → bytes¶

Sets new slowref reference value

set_slowref_fbp(iRef1=0, iRef2=0, iRef3=0, iRef4=0) → bytes¶

Sets slowref reference value for FBP power supplies

set_slowref_fbp_readback_mon(iRef1=0, iRef2=0, iRef3=0, iRef4=0) → float¶

Sets slowref reference value for FBP power supplies and returns current readback

set_slowref_fbp_readback_ref(iRef1=0, iRef2=0, iRef3=0, iRef4=0) → float¶

Sets slowref reference value for FBP power supplies and returns reference current

set_slowref_readback_mon(setpoint: float) → bytes¶

Sets slowref reference value and returns current readback

set_slowref_readback_ref(setpoint: float) → float¶

Sets slowref reference value and returns reference current

store_param_bank_csv(bank)¶

Saves parameter bank to CSV file

property timeout: float¶

Communication bus timeout

turn_off()¶

Turns off power supply

turn_on()¶

Turns on power supply

unlock_udc(password)¶

Unlocks UDC, enables password protected commands to be ran
